The contract duration shall be extended for a period equivalent to the delay caused by the first party. Penalties for delays do not absolve the subcontractor (second party) from their responsibilities regarding the completion of the required work or any obligations within
within their scope of work as per the agreement 4. The second party shall be held responsible for any material damages caused to the first party by the owner or consultant resulting from defects in their work
on the project or any delays the first party is entitled to deduct any amounts imposed by the consultant or the owner on the first party due to the actions of the second party, in addition to delay penalties.
The previous paragraph does not limit the company’s responsibility for any injuries or fatalities caused by the gross negligence of the second party. 6. The first party shall compensate the second party with time extensions for delays caused by circumstances specific to the consultant or the owner.
